title: Understanding the Costs and Responsibilities of Renting
description: This chapter explores the financial implications and legal responsibilities associated with renting a property, helping students make informed decisions about lease agreements, understand the true costs of renting, and know their rights and responsibilities as tenants.
learning_objectives: Identify and explain the key components of a lease agreement
Calculate the true costs associated with renting, including rent, security deposits, utilities, and other fees
Evaluate the advantages and disadvantages of renting compared to other housing options
Determine personal priorities when selecting a rental property
Understand tenant rights and responsibilities in various rental situations

skill_builder.title: Rental Property Comparison Checklist
skill_builder.description: An interactive activity where students create a personalized checklist for comparing rental properties based on their priorities and use it to evaluate different rental options.
